structure.unit: GENERAL PROVISIONS CONCERNING CRIMES AND PUNISHMENTS

law.catch_line: City police to serve warrant, when.
law.text: Any warrant issued by District Court for an offense committed within a city shall be served by the police department of that city if the warrant is to be served within the city limits.
law.history: Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 249, sec. 2, effective June 17, 1978.
